languages.text: {n}Чудо-аппарат неохотно втягивает предложенный лист и издает звук, отдаленно напоминающий стон. Спустя минуту томительного ожидания вам в руки падает лист с надписью "УШИБ РАБОТКИ", что, вероятнее всего, означает "Ошибка обработки".{/n}

{n}The miraculous device reluctantly accepts the offered paper and makes a vague moan-like sound. After a languid moment of waiting, you are presented with a sheet that reads "ERR" — which most likely means "error."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Чудо-аппарат неохотно втягивает предложенный лист и издает звук, отдаленно напоминающий стон. Спустя минуту томительного ожидания вам в руки падает лист с надписью "УШИБ РАБОТКИ", что, вероятнее всего, означает "Ошибка обработки".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The miraculous device reluctantly accepts the offered paper and makes a vaguely moaning sound. After a languid moment of waiting you are presented with a sheet that reads 'RECESSING AIR', which most likely means 'processing error'.{/n}

{n}The miraculous device reluctantly accepts the offered paper and makes a vague moan-like sound. After a languid moment of waiting, you are presented with a sheet that reads "ERR" — which most likely means "error."{/n}

{n}The miraculous device reluctantly accepts the offered paper and makes a vague moan-like sound. After a languid moment of waiting, you are presented with a sheet that reads "ERR" — which most likely means "error."{/n}

languages.text: {n}这台神奇的装置不情愿地接受了递过来的纸，发出了模糊的呻吟声。你慵懒地等待了一阵子之后，纸重新吐了出来，上面只写了一个字——“错”，很可能是“错误”的意思。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The miraculous device reluctantly accepts the offered paper and makes a vague moan-like sound. After a languid moment of waiting, you are presented with a sheet that reads "ERR" — which most likely means "error."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这台神奇的装置不情愿地接受了递过来的纸，发出了模糊的呻吟声。你慵懒地等待了一阵子之后，纸重新吐了出来，上面只写了一个字——“错”，很可能是“错误”的意思。{/n}

languages.text: {n}その奇跡の装置は、差し込まれた紙をしぶしぶ受け取り、うめき声のような曖昧な音を発した。気だるい沈黙のひとときの後、差し出された紙には「ERR」と書かれていた―おそらく「エラー」を意味しているのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The miraculous device reluctantly accepts the offered paper and makes a vague moan-like sound. After a languid moment of waiting, you are presented with a sheet that reads "ERR" — which most likely means "error."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その奇跡の装置は、差し込まれた紙をしぶしぶ受け取り、うめき声のような曖昧な音を発した。気だるい沈黙のひとときの後、差し出された紙には「ERR」と書かれていた―おそらく「エラー」を意味しているのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El milagroso dispositivo acepta a regañadientes la hoja de papel que le ofreces y emite un ruido que recuerda vagamente a un quejido. Al cabo de una lánguida espera, asoma una hoja que tiene escrita la palabra «ERR», lo que seguramente signifique «error».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The miraculous device reluctantly accepts the offered paper and makes a vague moan-like sound. After a languid moment of waiting, you are presented with a sheet that reads "ERR" — which most likely means "error."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El milagroso dispositivo acepta a regañadientes la hoja de papel que le ofreces y emite un ruido que recuerda vagamente a un quejido. Al cabo de una lánguida espera, asoma una hoja que tiene escrita la palabra «ERR», lo que seguramente signifique «error».{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mucizevi düzenek, sunulan kâğıdı isteksizce kabul edip iniltiye benzeyen belli belirsiz bir ses çıkarıyor. Ağır aksak bir bekleyişin anından sonra sana "HAT" yazan bir kâğıt sunuyor. Bu büyük olasılıkla "hata" anlamına geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The miraculous device reluctantly accepts the offered paper and makes a vague moan-like sound. After a languid moment of waiting, you are presented with a sheet that reads "ERR" — which most likely means "error."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mucizevi düzenek, sunulan kâğıdı isteksizce kabul edip iniltiye benzeyen belli belirsiz bir ses çıkarıyor. Ağır aksak bir bekleyişin anından sonra sana "HAT" yazan bir kâğıt sunuyor. Bu büyük olasılıkla "hata" anlamına geliyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'appareil miraculeux accepte la feuille à contrecœur en produisant un son évoquant un gémissement. Après une longue attente, vous recevez une feuille indiquant « ERR », très probablement la forme abrégée du mot « erreur ».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The miraculous device reluctantly accepts the offered paper and makes a vague moan-like sound. After a languid moment of waiting, you are presented with a sheet that reads "ERR" — which most likely means "error."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'appareil miraculeux accepte la feuille à contrecœur en produisant un son évoquant un gémissement. Après une longue attente, vous recevez une feuille indiquant « ERR », très probablement la forme abrégée du mot « erreur ».{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das wundersame Gerät zieht das Papier zögerlich ein und macht dabei ein Geräusch, als würde es stöhnen. Nach einem trägen Moment des Wartens präsentiert es dir ein Blatt, auf dem "ERR" zu lesen ist ... vermutlich liegt also ein Fehler vor."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The miraculous device reluctantly accepts the offered paper and makes a vague moan-like sound. After a languid moment of waiting, you are presented with a sheet that reads "ERR" — which most likely means "error."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das wundersame Gerät zieht das Papier zögerlich ein und macht dabei ein Geräusch, als würde es stöhnen. Nach einem trägen Moment des Wartens präsentiert es dir ein Blatt, auf dem "ERR" zu lesen ist ... vermutlich liegt also ein Fehler vor."{/n}
